question: According to the U.S. Department of Transportation Launches Climate Action Strategy Playbook to Help Communities Across America Reduce Emissions, the playbook includes ______ climate solutions.

question: According to the U.S. Department of Transportation Launches Climate Action Strategy Playbook to Help Communities Across America Reduce Emissions, strategies in the playbook include active transportation, electric vehicles, and ______ operational efficiencies.

question: According to the Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security, the Framework was developed by and for entities at each layer of the AI supply chain, including cloud and compute providers, AI developers, and ______.
explanation: The policy mentions these entities along with civil society and public sector entities as part of the AI supply chain.
policy_name: Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security

question: According to the Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security, AI developers are recommended to adopt a ______ approach.
explanation: The policy specifically advises AI developers to adopt a Secure by Design approach.

question: According to the Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security, the Artificial Intelligence Safety and Security Board was established by ______.

choice.B: The AI Safety and Security Board was established by Congress through the AI in Government Act of 2020.

question: According to the Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security, ______ plays an important role in securing the environments used to develop and deploy AI in critical infrastructure.
explanation: The framework outlines the importance of cloud and compute infrastructure providers in securing development environments.

question: According to the Groundbreaking Framework for the Safe and Secure Deployment of AI in Critical Infrastructure Unveiled by Department of Homeland Security, Secretary Mayorkas convened the Board for the first time in May 2023.

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, Sean Duffy was sworn in as the ___ Secretary of the United States Department of Transportation.
explanation: Sean Duffy was officially sworn in as the 20th Secretary of the USDOT.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

choice.C: Pete Buttigieg is the current (19th) Secretary of Transportation, not Sean Duffy. This appears to be incorrect information as Sean Duffy has not been sworn in as Transportation Secretary.

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, the memorandum signed by Secretary Duffy aims to reset ___ standards.
explanation: Secretary Duffy’s first act was signing a memorandum directing staff to start the process of resetting Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) standards.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, the current CAFE rule requires all passenger cars and light trucks to meet a standard of ___ mpg in Model Year 2031.
explanation: Current rule requires all passenger cars and light trucks to meet a standard of 50.4 mpg in Model Year 2031.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, the average car price increased from ___ in March 2021 to ___ in March 2024.
explanation: From March 2021 to March 2024, the cost of a car increased from $40,881 to an average of $47,218.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, the memorandum signed by Secretary Duffy eliminates the electric vehicle mandate.
explanation: The memorandum signed today specifically reduces the burdensome and overly restrictive fuel standards and eliminates the electric vehicle mandate.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

question: According to《Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable》, more than 20 vehicle models had transaction prices below $25,000 in March 2024.
explanation: In March 2024, of the 275 new-vehicle models available for purchase, only eight had transaction prices below $25,000.
policy_name: Sean Duffy Sworn In as Secretary of U.S. Department of Transportation and Takes Immediate Action to Make Cars More Affordable

question: According to VA Directive 0005 - Scientific Integrity, the ___ serves as the senior Department official responsible for ensuring that scientific integrity is upheld across VA.

choice.A: Assistant Secretary for Health for Research and Development
choice.D: Assistant Under Secretary for Health for Discovery, Education and Affiliate Networks

question: According to VA Directive 0005 - Scientific Integrity, all VA employees and appointees must receive information about the directive within ___ of its issuance.
explanation: All VA employees and appointees must receive information providing awareness of the issuance within 1 year.
policy_name: VA Directive 0005 - Scientific Integrity

question: According to VA Directive 0005 - Scientific Integrity, actions or practices that compromise scientific integrity include altering or ___ scientific findings.
explanation: Compromising scientific integrity includes altering or distorting findings.

question: According to VA Directive 0005 - Scientific Integrity, VA Directive 5021 and its associated Handbook describe the fact-finding processes used for alleged violations.
explanation: VA Directive 0700, not 5021, describes the fact-finding processes used for alleged violations.

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, states should establish high quality paid _______ programs for teaching.
explanation: Establish high quality paid Registered Apprenticeship programs for teaching

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, the U.S. Department of Labor approved the first nationally registered K-12 Teacher Occupation Apprenticeship in _______.
explanation: The U.S. Department of Labor has recently approved the first nationally registered K-12 Teacher Occupation Apprenticeship in Tennessee.
policy_name: August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, the average teacher salary is so low in 38 states that mid-career teachers who are the head of household qualify for two or more government benefits based on _______.
explanation: In 38 states, the average teacher salary is so low that mid-career teachers who are the head of household for a family of four qualify for two or more government benefits based on income.
policy_name: August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA) Title I funding can be used to support placing eligible participants into _______.
explanation: Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (WIOA) Title I funding for this purpose. WIOA-title I programs that can potentially be used to support placing eligible participants into RAPs.

choice.B: Eligible participants can be placed into vocational training programs.
choice.C: Teaching positions and education-related jobs through registered apprenticeship programs and work-based learning opportunities.

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, it is suggested that teacher preparation programs provide unpaid on-the-job training.
explanation: It is suggested that teacher preparation programs provide significant 'on the job training' through clinical experiences which are structured, paid, and part of an 'earn and learn' model.
policy_name: August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce

question: According to August 31, 2022 -- Joint Letter with Secretary Martin Walsh of DOL regarding a Sustainable Teacher Workforce, Registered Apprenticeships are used to develop more skilled and diverse workforce and retain workers through increased turnover.
explanation: Registered Apprenticeships help retain workers through reduced turnover.

question: According to the policy titled 'Biden-Harris Administration Announces Supply Chain Resilience Center to Protect U.S. Supply Chain from Evolving Threats,' the SCRC will release an updated compilation of key DHS port security advisories in early _____.

explanation: Host at least two table-top exercises in 2024 to test the resiliency of critical cross-border supply chains.

question: According to the policy titled 'Biden-Harris Administration Announces Supply Chain Resilience Center to Protect U.S. Supply Chain from Evolving Threats,' the SCRC will be comprised of personnel from DHS Headquarters, FEMA, _____, U.S. Coast Guard, CBP, ICE, and CISA.

policy_name: Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address

explanation: Integrate AI into our efforts to enhance the integrity of our supply chains and the broader trade environment.

question: According to 《Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address》, within how many days will the AI Task Force deliver a concept of operations and milestones?
explanation: Within 60 days, the group will deliver a concept of operations and milestones for advancing the four priority initiatives.
policy_name: Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address

policy_name: Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address

question: According to 《Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address》, the AI Task Force is tasked with identifying the importation of goods produced with forced labor.
explanation: We will seek to deploy AI to more ably screen cargo, identify the importation of goods produced with forced labor, and manage risk.
policy_name: Secretary Mayorkas Announces New Measures to Tackle A.I., PRC Challenges at First State of Homeland Security Address

question: According to VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program, the vehicle fleet must be managed in an effective, efficient, safe, fiscally, and ______ manner.
explanation: It is VA policy to manage and operate the vehicle fleet in an effective, efficient, safe, fiscally, and environmentally sound manner to support the mission, achieve internal goals, and conform to all applicable laws, regulations, and other guidance.
policy_name: VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program

question: According to VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program, electric vehicles shall be acquired unless otherwise justified through the ______.
explanation: All acquisitions of light-duty vehicles shall be ZEVs unless otherwise justified through the VAM tool.
policy_name: VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program

question: According to VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program, telematics must be installed in all vehicles retained over ______ years without exception.
explanation: All vehicles shall have telematics installed if planned to be retained over two years without exception.
policy_name: VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program

question: According to VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program, drivers must not use ______ while operating a vehicle unless using hands-free technology.
explanation: Cell phones shall not be used while operating a vehicle except in accordance with state and local laws, and where the vehicle is equipped with hands-free technology.
policy_name: VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program

question: According to VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program, all facilities must ensure that telematics data is reported annually.
explanation: Telematics shall be a required reporting element at least once a quarter.
policy_name: VA Directive 0637 - VA Vehicle Fleet Management Program

question: According to Secretary Raimondo Statement on Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework, effective _______organizations can transfer personal data from Switzerland to Swiss-U.S. DPF-certified organizations in the United States.
explanation: Effective September 15, 2024, this change enables organizations to transfer personal data from Switzerland to Swiss-U.S. DPF-certified organizations in the United States.
policy_name: Secretary Raimondo Statement on Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework

explanation: The Swiss-U.S. DPF offers U.S. businesses conducting business with Switzerland an affordable and efficient solution for transferring personal data.
policy_name: Secretary Raimondo Statement on Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework

question: According to Secretary Raimondo Statement on Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework, the change was effective from September 15, 2023.
explanation: The change is effective September 15, 2024, not 2023.
policy_name: Secretary Raimondo Statement on Swiss-U.S. Data Privacy Framework

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, the DOE announced its intent to issue a $__ million funding opportunity for the new Programa de Comunidades Resilientes.
explanation: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) announced its intent to issue a $325 million funding opportunity for the new Programa de Comunidades Resilientes.
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, the Programa de Comunidades Resilientes is funded by DOE’s _____.
explanation: The new program aims to improve community-level energy resilience for vulnerable populations across Puerto Rico, funded by DOE’s Puerto Rico Energy Resilience Fund (PR-ERF).
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

choice.A: Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, DOE may award between $70 million and $140 million to fund energy resilience solutions for _____.
explanation: DOE may award between $70 million and $140 million to fund energy resilience solutions for federally qualified health centers, dialysis centers, and diagnostic and treatment centers.
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

choice.A: Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico
choice.C: Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing combined together in Puerto Rico
choice.D: DOE may award between $70 million and $140 million to fund energy resilience solutions for solar and battery storage projects.

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, the program would fund solar and battery storage installations for community centers and common areas within _____.
explanation: This new program aims to improve community-level energy resilience by funding solar and battery storage installations for community healthcare facilities and subsidized multi-family housing properties.
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, President Biden signed into law $__ billion for the establishment of the PR-ERF in December 2022.
explanation: In December 2022, President Biden signed into law $1 billion for the establishment of the PR-ERF.
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

question: According to DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico, the Programa Acceso Solar was launched in February 2024 to connect low-income Puerto Rican households with subsidized residential solar and battery storage systems.
explanation: In February 2024, DOE launched the Programa Acceso Solar through the PR-ERF.
policy_name: DOE Announces Intent to Fund Solar and Battery Storage for Community Healthcare Facilities and Multi-Family Housing Serving Low-and-Moderate-Income Communities in Puerto Rico

question: According to Advances of pay, an individual must have a scheduled tour of duty and be serving under an appointment not limited to ________ or less to receive an advance of pay.
explanation: The employee must have a scheduled tour of duty and be serving under an appointment not limited to six months or less.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, 'basic pay' includes any special rate or special pay rate adjustment for ________ under FEPCA.
explanation: 'Basic pay' for this purpose means ... any special rate or special pay rate adjustment for law enforcement officers under 403, 404, or 405 of the FEPCA.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, an advance of pay must be recovered by payroll deduction within ________ pay periods of the date of the employee's appointment.
explanation: An advance of pay must be recovered by payroll deduction within 14 pay periods of the date of the employee's appointment.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, a written finding of hardship must be filed in the employee's ________.
explanation: A written finding of hardship must be filed in the employee's electronic Official Personnel Folder (eOPF).
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, the policy stipulates that imprest funds may not be used for ________.
explanation: Per the Department's Office of Financial Management, imprest funds may not be used to pay an advance of pay.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, repayment of an advance in pay may be waived in unusual circumstances such as ________.
explanation: Repayment of an advance in pay may be waived in unusual circumstances, e.g., involuntary separation --- not for cause.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to Advances of pay, an advance may be authorized after the employee takes the oath of office but not later than 90 days after appointment.
explanation: An advance may not be authorized before the date on which the employee takes the oath of office or later than 60 days after appointment.
policy_name: Advances of pay

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, the two-year segregation period temporarily withdraws approximately ______ acres of public lands.
explanation: Secretary of the Interior Deb Haaland today initiated a two-year segregation period to temporarily withdraw approximately 165,000 acres of public lands in the Upper Pecos watershed.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, the geographical area affected covers multiple Pecos River tributaries including ______ and ______.
explanation: The withdrawal would encompass multiple Pecos River tributaries, including Dalton Canyon, Macho Canyon, Wild Horse Creek, Indian Creek, and Doctor Creek.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, the proposed withdrawal area includes approximately ______ acres of National Forest System lands.
explanation: The proposed withdrawal area includes approximately 163,483 acres of National Forest System lands and 1,327 acres of Bureau of Land Management-managed public lands.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, lands in the Upper Pecos are of cultural importance to Indigenous Peoples, including the Pueblos of ______ and ______.
explanation: Lands in the Upper Pecos are of cultural importance to Indigenous Peoples, including the Pueblos of Jemez and Tesuque.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

choice.B: Pueblo of Santa Clara, Pueblo of San Ildefonso
choice.D: Pueblo of Nambe, Pueblo of Pojoaque

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, the segregation helps deliver clean water to ______ users and local communities.
explanation: The Upper Pecos watershed provides intact, pristine habitat... and helps deliver clean water to downstream agricultural users and local communities.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

question: According to《Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims》, only the Secretary of the Interior can effectuate a permanent withdrawal of the Pecos watershed.
explanation: Only Congress can effectuate a permanent withdrawal.
policy_name: Secretary Haaland Initiates Two-Year Protection of Pecos River Watershed from Mining Claims

question: According to《Housing Finance Agency Risk-sharing Section 542(c)》, the Section provides new risk-sharing arrangements to help HFAs provide more ________ and credit for multifamily loans.
explanation: Section 542(c) enables the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) and State and local housing finance agencies (HFAs) to provide new risk-sharing arrangements to help those agencies provide more insurance and credit for multifamily loans.

question: According to the U.S. Department of the Treasury, IRS Release Guidance to Drive American Innovation, Cut Aviation Sector Emissions, the SAF Credit incentivizes the production of fuels that achieve a lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions reduction of at least ___% compared with petroleum-based jet fuel.

question: According to the U.S. Department of the Treasury, IRS Release Guidance to Drive American Innovation, Cut Aviation Sector Emissions, the tax credit for SAF that achieves a GHG emissions reduction of more than 50% increases by $0.01 per gallon for each percentage point the reduction exceeds 50%, up to ___ per gallon.

question: According to the U.S. Department of the Treasury, IRS Release Guidance to Drive American Innovation, Cut Aviation Sector Emissions, the USDA pilot program for CSA practices is specific to the ___ credit, in effect for 2023 and 2024.
